name: MyMotivator
0:
”Alexa open My Motivator”
”Alexa ask my motivator to motivate me”
”Alexa ask my motivator say something nice about me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my motivator
des:
My Motivator is the skill for Alexa, who motivates you with motivational slogans or compliments and keeps you in a good mood.

Sometimes My Motivator exaggerates it a bit, but what he is serious!

For example, just say "Alexa ask My Motivator to motivate me" and My Motivator answers with a motivating sentence or a compliment.

Let My Motivator surprise, motivate or simply entertain you.

This skill is regularly expanded to make it a valuable companion to your everyday life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
